name: map_pf_incidence_rate
title: Malaria Atlas Project - Malaria (Pf) Incidence Rate
description: Number of newly diagnosed Malaria (Plasmodium falciparum) cases per 1,000 population, in a given year

extract_types_info.max: maximum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Hay, S.I. and Snow, R.W., 2006. The Malaria Atlas Project: developing global maps of malaria risk. PLoS medicine, 3(12), p.e473.
